segments.text: The scene hits me with a wave of sadness.

segments.text: That poor woman, so unaware of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water flooding from the sink, damaging all in its path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying the plate like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are risking it all for some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool is about to give, I can tell.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's just standing there, expecting her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside seems like a safe haven.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would intervene before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
